user_query: TENET so TENET's a new film starring Christopher Nolan well it's written and directed by Christopher Nolan I just feel like Christopher Nolan the movies are really Christopher Nolan's a star so anyhow it stars John David Washington Robert Pattinson and we saw the trailer right the trailer shows you that they're looking for bad guy Kenneth Branagh there's this ability to reverse time is called inversion in which things go backwards through what we perceive as time but it's in there the trailer lied to us it did which trailers their mouthpieces for movies they're propaganda it's kind of like Fox News for the right CNN for the left movie trailers for movies they're there to convince you that this thing is going to be the greatest thing ever so sometimes in movie trailers they showcase something that really isn't front and center for a large section of the movie and such is the case with TENET TENET's essentially a spy movie like consciously I'm watching the movie I'm like okay so this is like Christopher Nolan does James Bond or any other spy movie new guy gets recruited there's a bad guy and he has a super bad thing that can do a lot of damage to the world so they got to stop bad guys this movie's two and a half hours long it's not like for two and a half hours you're dealing with good guys and bad guys doing inversion going backwards and forwards and it's not for the bulk of the movie that's not the case for the bulk of this movie you gotta go into this movie being like okay

entities.entity_description: TENET은 크리스토퍼 놀란이 각본과 연출을 맡은 새로운 영화로, 시간을 역행하는 '인버전'이라는 능력을 다루는 스파이 영화이다. 상영 시간은 2시간 30분이며, 제임스 본드 같은 스파이 영화 장르를 크리스토퍼 놀란 스타일로 만든 작품이다
크리스토퍼 놀란은 TENET의 각본가이자 감독으로, 그의 영화에서 진정한 스타라고 평가받는 인물이다
존 데이비드 워싱턴은 TENET에 출연하는 배우로, 새로 모집된 요원 역할을 맡았다
케네스 브래너는 TENET에서 악당 역할을 맡은 배우이다

relationships.relationship_description: 크리스토퍼 놀란은 TENET의 각본과 연출을 담당했다
케네스 브래너는 TENET에서 악당 역할로 출연했다

JOHN DAVID WASHINGTON.description: JOHN DAVID WASHINGTON -> JOHN DAVID WASHINGTON
